name: 7-Day Shmup
description:
This is a very simple shoot'em-up game I made for fun (and practice) in a week! It lacks polish but should be playable. The game was made with Unity, 3D models with Blender and sound effects with Bfxr.

Credits
  • MinionsArt for the explosion shaders
  • cynicmusic for the stage music
  • ISAo for the boss music
